variable.name: PC1
variable.description: Principal Component 1: distinguishes between Africans from non-Africans

variable.name: PC2
variable.description: Principal Component 2: distinguishes East Asians from Africans and Europeans, with South Asians and Mexicans at intermediate values

variable.name: PC3
variable.description: Principal Component 3: distinguishes South Asians from East Asians

variable.name: PC4
variable.description: Principal Component 4: distinguishes Mexicans from non-Mexicans

variable.name: PC5
variable.description: Principal Component 5: reveals a north-to-south cline within Europeans

variable.name: PC6
variable.description: Principal Component 6: distinguishes the African Americans from the HapMap Africans

variable.name: PC7
variable.description: Principal Component 7: separates the three East Asian populations (Japan, HapMap CHB, Taiwan)
